title: Decisive
description: A guide to making better decisions by overcoming common biases and pitfalls. The book introduces a four-step process to improve decision-making: Widen Your Options, Reality-Test Your Assumptions, Attain Distance Before Deciding, and Prepare to Be Wrong.
